channel.title: Pivot Tables on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Pivot Tables on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Create Pivot Table
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Introduction 2 Create Pivot Table 3 Sample Code || Introduction Please use IPivotTableCollection.Add() method to create a pivot table inside the worksheet. Once, the pivot table is created, you can work with it using the IPivotTable class. Create Pivot Table The following sample code shows how to create a pivot table and work with it.

item.title: Manipulate Pivot Table
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Manipulate Pivot Table 3 Sample Code 4 Console Output || Possible Usage Scenarios Besides creating new pivot tables, you can manipulate the new and existing pivot tables. You can change the data in the source range of pivot table and then refresh and calculate it and attain the new values of pivot table cells.
